description.displayText: Hayley was our Nanny for over 3 years & still continues to babysit our 6 year old daughter occasionally. We were extremely comfortable w/ Hayley from the very beginning & could tell how amazing she was in her natural ability to really care about getting to know our daughter; her likes & dislikes & really took the time to play & engage with her. Everyday our daughter was excited to see her & bonded immediately. We always felt she was safe & well taken care of; never had to worry. Aside from being prompt & efficient, Hayley was always focused on our daughter & took a strong interest in her well-being & was always clear in her communications with us. Additionally, Hayley is an all-around warm, caring, dedicated, positive & energetic person. She is incredibly responsible & dependable; a great caregiver who uses understanding & patience when interacting with our daughter. We consider Hayley part of our family & are so lucky to have her help & support; any family would be very fortunate too

description.displayText:
Hayley worked for us years ago for a very early before-care situation. Prior to meeting Hayley, we'd been hard-pressed to keep a sitter in this position...the before-dawn start time just proved too difficult for most and they either quit after a few weeks or had to be let go for continual lateness.
Hayley was a breath of fresh air...so much more responsible and dependable than any of her predecessors. She was never late, never missed a day without plenty of advanced notice.
But Hayley became so much more to us than just a reliable sitter. She connected with my daughter on her level while respecting my rules. She treated her like a beloved little sister, not like she was just a job. She stayed with us until my daughter was old enough to walk to school by herself and since become a close family friend.
